rukus.text: amado geudaeneun geudeul-i midji anihameulo geudae ma-eum-i seulpeojilila
hananim-i wonhaessdamyeon geubun-eun geudeul-ege haneullobuteo yejeung-eul naelyeo geudeullo hayeogeum sunjongke hayeoss-euli la
geuleona hananim-eulobuteo saeloun malsseum-i geudeul-ege ileul ttaemada geudeul-eun deung-eul dollieossdeola
geudeul-eun geu mesejileul bujeonghayeoss-euni geudeul-i jolonghaessdeon sasil-eul al ge doelila
geudeul-eun daejileul balaboji anihaneunyo hananim-i geu an-e eolmana manh-eun yeoleo jonglyuui joh-eun geos-eul saengseongke haneunyo
sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i issgeo neul geuleona geudeul daedasuneun midji a nihadeola
sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
